column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The service was solid. Nothing extraordinary
column2: but definitely still made for a nice evening. I have several sets of friends coming into town in the next month and I've told each of them to try scoring reservations here because it's just too good! And honestly
column3: the prices are a huge plus for me. In my opinion
column4: for the quality and portion of the food
column5: it's worth every penny -- and I don't say that very often.
